Package millionaire

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
millionaire.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
It represents the connection between Gui class and Game class. (The controller of MVC design pattern).
Author:
Mohammad, Henrik, Jesse, Joakim.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Game game
    It represents the Model of MVC design pattern.
    private Gui gui
    game variable represents the View of MVC design pattern.
    private static Controller instance
    It is the only instance of this class (singleton).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private Controller()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void checkTimerSeconds()
    Method that checks if the time reaches 0, and calls the endTheGame method, which ends the game.
    void endTheGame​(boolean withDraw)
    if the player is not at the last level of the game and get wrong answer, it will send the correct answer (just to show the player the right answer before moving to EndGameScreen) and send wrong sound effect to gui to later show in EndGameScreen.
    static Controller getInstance()
    It returns a controller object.
    void setAnswer​(char buttonSymbol)
    setAnswer() will be called when the player will select an answer for the question.
    private void setQuestion()
    this method brings the question and its options and send them to View (gui) that will show it on the screen.
    private void setQuestion​(java.lang.String[] fullQuestion)
    Its overloading of setQuestion() and it used when the gui need to be updated after using change question or remove half life lines.
    (package private) static void setupController​(Game game, Gui gui)  
    void startTheGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
    start new game for user and name, questions and seconds on timer will start
    void useLifeLine​(java.lang.String lifeLineSelection)
    Calls the different lifeline methods in game class and send the result to the lifelinearea or the questionarea.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • instance

      private static final Controller instance
      It is the only instance of this class (singleton).

    • gui

      private Gui gui
      game variable represents the View of MVC design pattern.

    • game

      private Game game
      It represents the Model of MVC design pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      private Controller()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Controller getInstance()
      It returns a controller object.
      Returns:
      the only possible instance of this class (singleton).

    • setupController

      static void setupController​(Game game, Gui gui)
      Parameters:
      game - reference to controller
      gui - reference to controller

    • startTheGame

      public void startTheGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
      start new game for user and name, questions and seconds on timer will start
      Parameters:
      playerName - create a field that player can insert ID

    • setAnswer

      public void setAnswer​(char buttonSymbol)
      setAnswer() will be called when the player will select an answer for the question. It's make some changes that fits the situation for example: making the background color of the selection button yellow and disable the other selections. It will also temporarily disabling the lifelines.
      Parameters:
      buttonSymbol - will be yellow if clicked on. green if correct answer. red if wrong answer.

    • setQuestion

      private void setQuestion()
      this method brings the question and its options and send them to View (gui) that will show it on the screen.

    • setQuestion

      private void setQuestion​(java.lang.String[] fullQuestion)
      Its overloading of setQuestion() and it used when the gui need to be updated after using change question or remove half life lines.
      Parameters:
      fullQuestion - a string array consist of 5 strings (question text and its alternative)

    • endTheGame

      public void endTheGame​(boolean withDraw)
      if the player is not at the last level of the game and get wrong answer, it will send the correct answer (just to show the player the right answer before moving to EndGameScreen) and send wrong sound effect to gui to later show in EndGameScreen. This method will send the player's name,balance and date to the EndGameScreen.
      Parameters:
      withDraw - a boolean parameter

    • checkTimerSeconds

      private void checkTimerSeconds()
      Method that checks if the time reaches 0, and calls the endTheGame method, which ends the game.

    • useLifeLine

      public void useLifeLine​(java.lang.String lifeLineSelection)
      Calls the different lifeline methods in game class and send the result to the lifelinearea or the questionarea.
      Parameters:
      lifeLineSelection - The different lifelines
